title: Understanding Power BI
text: Power BI is a tool that integrates various features to help users analyze and visualize data. It is part of the Microsoft Power Platform.

title: Key Features of Power BI
text: Power BI allows users to connect to multiple data sources, create interactive reports, and share insights with others.

hintAnswer: combines other Power Tools with other features to find and visualize data, share, and collaborate
title: Identifying the Correct Function
text: Which of the following best describes what Power BI does?
choices: extracts, connects, refines, and transforms large amounts of data into Excel files
enables you to import and compare large amounts of data from multiple sources to build analytical relationships
creates an interactive visualization tool used to provide a $$drag-and-drop$$ interface for rapid model building
combines other Power Tools with other features to find and visualize data, share, and collaborate
